programme.title: Christmas Island
programme.desc: When a snowstorm diverts Kate's first private flight to Christmas Island, she must team up with an air traffic controller to secure her dream job as the family's pilot.

programme.title: The Christmas Charade
programme.desc: Facing another dull Christmas alone, sparks fly when a risk-averse librarian accidentally gets wrapped up with a grinchy FBI agent in an undercover mission to save the Heart of Christmas.

programme.title: Let It Snow
programme.desc: An executive examines her company's new property and prepares a presentation to transform the rustic lodge into a new hot spot. She tries to ignore the lodge's festive celebrations during her stay, but an unexpected romance changes her heart.

programme.title: An Unexpected Christmas
programme.desc: A speech writer makes a deal with his ex-girlfriend to pretend they are a couple to save his family's Christmas. It's not long before both the ruse and their feelings catch up with them.

programme.title: Christmas at Pemberley Manor
programme.desc: A rich man falls back in love with Christmas and a party planner.

programme.title: Mystic Christmas
programme.desc: A woman reconnects with the owner of a pizza shop while working at a rehabilitation center and aquarium during the holidays.

programme.title: Inventing the Christmas Prince
programme.desc: Shelby is about to quit her job as a rocket engineer when her daughter becomes convinced that her Scrooge-like boss is a Christmas prince from a story.

programme.title: A Dickens of a Holiday!
programme.desc: To mark the 100th anniversary of a Victorian festival, Cassie invites movie star and former high school classmate Jake to play Scrooge in "A Christmas Carol.".

programme.title: Haul Out the Holly
programme.desc: Emily comes home to visit her parents, only to discover they're leaving for a trip of their own. While staying at their house for the holidays, Emily meets members of the community who want her to join in the neighborhood's Christmas festivities.

programme.title: A Heidelberg Holiday
programme.desc: Heidi Heidelberg receives a dream opportunity to sell her beautiful, handmade glass ornaments at the prestigious Heidelberg Christmas Market in Germany. While there, she meets Lukas, a local artisan who helps her reconnect with her lost heritage.

programme.title: Flipping for Christmas
programme.desc: It's almost Christmas when busy realtor Abigail agrees to help her sister with the simple flip of a recently inherited home. Unfortunately, co-beneficiary Bo has other plans in mind.

programme.title: 'Twas the Date Before Christmas
programme.desc: Feeling the pressure to bring someone home for Christmas, Jessie convinces Bryan to join her family for a day filled with holiday events, only the family doesn't know it's their first date.

programme.title: The Santa Summit
programme.desc: At a Santa-themed holiday event, three teachers get their groove back, strengthen their friendship and unexpectedly find love along the way.

programme.title: Never Kiss a Man in a Christmas Sweater
programme.desc: A single mom faces Christmas alone until a stranger crashes into her life and becomes an unexpected houseguest.

programme.title: Operation Nutcracker
programme.desc: When an antique nutcracker set to be auctioned at the Warby family Christmas charity goes missing, a demanding event planner and the heir to the Warby dynasty try to track it down.

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: A struggling pastry chef is thrilled to learn that she has made it to the finals of the American Gingerbread Competition, but distractions in her love life threaten to derail her dreams of taking home the grand prize.

programme.title: Love, Lights, Hanukkah!
programme.desc: A restauranteur receives a DNA test revealing that she's Jewish. The discovery leads her to a new family and an unlikely romance over eight nights.

programme.title: Christmas in Tahoe
programme.desc: To save her family's hotel Christmas show, a talent booker must ask for help from her ex-boyfriend -- the lead guitarist of a now-famous band that fired her as its manager years ago.

programme.title: An Ice Palace Romance
programme.desc: A journalist faces old fears when she returns to her hometown ice rink to cover a story. With the help of the owner and his young daughter, she begins to reevaluate her life's purpose.

programme.title: Sense, Sensibility & Snowmen
programme.desc: Christmas party planners Ella and her sister Marianne clash with client Edward, a not-so-jolly toy company CEO.

programme.title: Mingle All the Way
programme.desc: A young entrepreneur is trying to win over investors for the dating app she has developed. To help bring on investors for expansion, she promises to take part in using it in the coming weeks before Christmas to find love and track her progress.

programme.title: The Nine Lives of Christmas
programme.desc: As the Christmas holiday draws near, a veterinary student (Kimberly Sustad) and a stray cat challenge a fireman's (Brandon Routh) commitment to life as a bachelor.

programme.title: Christmas With the Darlings
programme.desc: When an assistant gives her final notice, she is drawn into helping the younger brother of her boss as he looks after his orphaned nieces and nephew through Christmas.

programme.title: Catch Me if You Claus
programme.desc: Avery Quinn's shot at anchoring news clashes with a Santa-suited intruder, Chris, who insists he's Santa's son on a first Christmas mission. They unravel a career-making story together.

programme.title: The 5-Year Christmas Party
programme.desc: Told over the course of five years, two recent college grads find themselves drawn together year after year while working for a catering company that specializes in holiday parties.

programme.title: Trivia at St. Nick's
programme.desc: Locals compete in a Christmas bar trivia tournament at the end of the semester.

programme.title: Karen Kingsbury's Maggie's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Maggie tries to maintain the balance of being a mother and having a career. When her son Jordan needs help at school, he meets Casey, a tutor, and the two quickly bond. As Casey becomes a father figure, Jordan wishes his mom could find love again.

programme.title: A Little Christmas Charm
programme.desc: A jewelry designer teams up with an investigative reporter to find the owner of a charm bracelet before Christmas Eve.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Second Chance, First Love
programme.desc: After 15 years, a single father moves home from Hawaii with his two sons and, through a series of coincidences -- or Godwinks, ends up stuck in traffic next to his high school sweetheart.

programme.title: A Bramble House Christmas
programme.desc: While settling his father's estate, a man becomes suspicious as to why the man left his nurse a large sum of money after knowing her for less than two months before he died.

programme.title: Memories of Christmas
programme.desc: When Noelle inherits her mother's house, she finds out that for the past few years her aging mother had been hiring professionals to decorate it for Christmas. Noelle tells the decorator that the deal is off, but he refuses to take no for an answer.

programme.title: With Love, Christmas
programme.desc: When the office assignments are distributed for Secret Santa, Melanie is excited that she was given her crush, Donovan. Donovan is so taken by the thoughtful gifts and notes, he starts to fall in love. But someone else is stealing Melanie's credit.

programme.title: A Homecoming for the Holidays
programme.desc: Country singer Charlotte is home for the holidays and works with her brother's friend to build a house for a friend in town.

programme.title: Christmas Tree Lane
programme.desc: When music store owner Meg spearheads community efforts to save her street from demolition, she is shocked to find out that the man she's falling for is working for the company that she is fighting.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: Nick loses his high finance job right before Christmas. Lost, he takes a gig at a tree lot, where he meets Julie and her son, Matt.

programme.title: Christmas Wonderland
programme.desc: Heidi returns home to watch her niece and nephew and comes face to face with her high school love. Heidi offers to help him with a dance, and the more time she spends decorating, the more she finds herself inspired to start painting again.

programme.title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Four days before Christmas, Elizabeth Athens receives a voicemail from a number she doesn't recognize. On the message, a man she doesn't know makes one final plea for the love of his life to give him a second chance.

programme.title: To All a Good Night
programme.desc: A small-town photographer saves the life of a mysterious man who may just be here to buy her family's parkland.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

programme.title: Five Gold Rings
programme.desc: An artist returns home for the holidays and gets tasked with a Christmas quest left by her grandmother. She and the local PI must return lost items to their owners before Christmas.

programme.title: My Sweet Austrian Holiday
programme.desc: Charlotte inherits a chocolate shop from her grandparents but soon finds herself in a battle with a large developer who wants to buy the building to turn it into an exclusive shopping boutique.

programme.title: My Sweet Austrian Holiday
programme.desc: Charlotte inherits a chocolate shop from her grandparents but soon finds herself in a battle with a large developer who wants to buy the building to turn it into an exclusive shopping boutique.

programme.title: Five More Minutes: Moments Like These
programme.desc: Returning to her old home for the holidays, a young widow's Christmas wish for her son gets answered in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Christmas at Cartwright's
programme.desc: An angel delivers good fortune and the possibility of holiday romance to a struggling single mother who takes a job as a department store Santa Claus.

programme.title: Sharing Christmas
programme.desc: A real estate developer is given the opportunity to transform an old shopping complex into a prime location. Unfortunately, there is one tenant who is holding out -- the Christmas shop owner he met just days ago.

programme.title: Our Italian Christmas Memories
programme.desc: As their grandfather struggles with dementia, the Colucci siblings set out to re-create their late grandmother's legendary pasta sauce to help jog his memory.

programme.title: A Cookie Cutter Christmas
programme.desc: Two schoolteachers take their rivalry to a new level while they scramble to win a holiday baking contest and the affections of a handsome single father.

programme.title: The Christmas Club
programme.desc: Two busy strangers meet when they help an elderly woman find her lost Christmas savings. Thanks to fate and Christmas magic, they also find something they were both missing: true love.

programme.title: A December Bride
programme.desc: Layla accompanies Seth to her cousin's wedding, and everyone is surprised when she announces they're engaged. They are forced to keep up the pretense, and as they spend more time together, they find themselves feeling something very real.

programme.title: Love You Like Christmas
programme.desc: A high-powered executive reconsiders her priorities when car trouble leads her to Christmas Valley, a town in love with Christmas.

programme.title: Romance at Reindeer Lodge
programme.desc: Molly and Jared have both sworn off holiday events. When they find themselves stuck at a Christmas-themed ranch, they have no choice but to allow their cynical hearts to melt.

programme.title: A Glenbrooke Christmas
programme.desc: As Christmas nears, heiress Jessica Morgan seizes what seems like her last chance to experience a relaxed Christmas and heads off to the small town of Glenbrooke, where she meets a handsome fireman.

programme.title: This Time Each Year
programme.desc: Despite a trial separation, Lauren pretends to still be with her husband, Kevin, to placate her overbearing mother. The ruse may be just what the couple needs to finally work on their marriage.

programme.desc: Michelle Beadle, Chandler Parsons and Lou Williams discuss the biggest NBA games, matchups & storylines from around the league.

programme.title: The Dream Team
programme.desc: The story behind the historic Olympic gold medal run of the 1992 USA Men's Basketball team.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: An erratic whistleblower who calls Pride her mentor kidnaps him to help her locate a serial killer targeting young women in the Gulf of Mexico.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team joins forces with FBI Director Isler after a Russian operative with intelligence on sleeper agents disappears; Tammy partners with former sleeper agent Eva Azarova to assist in the disappearance.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean investigate a town where people are cheating death and discover that the Reapers have gone missing.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Charmed Ones do not realize that baby Wyatt's new imaginary friend is actually the demon Vicus, who is trying to win Wyatt's trust to convert him to evil.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When a classmate killed in front of Phoebe comes back from the dead to blame her, she becomes guilt-ridden and vulnerable, creating an opportunity for Zankou to steal the Book of Shadows.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters try to divert Zankou's attention from the Nexus, but Zankou steals Phoebe's power of premonition, enabling him to anticipate and prevent their attacks.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Presumed dead, the Charmed sisters start their demon-free existence with new identities.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A young demon (Mykel Shannon) trying to take over the Underworld attempts to lure the Charmed Ones out of hiding, and when Billie stumbles onto his plot, she becomes one of his victims.

programme.title: Charmed
